title: Lore Primer
content:
In a distant corner of the universe, a mysterious event caused the worlds of magic and technology to collide, creating a new dimension where both coexisted. This dimension, known as “The Merge,” became a haven for adventurers and outcasts from across the multiverse.
As one of the few beings capable of using both magic and technology, you have stumbled upon The Merge and have been drawn into its wild and dangerous landscape. You are not alone, however. Other dimension hoppers like yourself have also made their way to The Merge, each with their own unique abilities and expertise.
In the aftermath of the Great Collision, the inhabitants of The Merge are struggling to come to terms with their new reality. Some see the collision as an opportunity to forge a new path, combining magic and technology to achieve incredible feats. Others are more resistant to change and cling to the traditional ways of their respective worlds.
As a dimension hopper, you have the unique ability to use both magic and technology to your advantage. The choice is yours, but be warned - The Merge is a dangerous place, and not everyone can be trusted. Other dimension hoppers, who may have their own agendas, could pose a threat to your safety and the balance of power in The Merge.
description:
In a distant corner of the universe, a mysterious event caused the worlds of magic and technology to collide, creating a new dimension where both coexisted. This dimension, known as “The Merge,” became a haven for adventurers and outcasts from across the multiverse.
As one of the few beings capable of using both magic and technology, you have stumbled upon The Merge and have been drawn into its wild and dangerous landscape.

title: Welcome to the Merge!
content:
Welcome to The Merge, a dimension where magic and technology coexist in a fragile balance. You are a dimension hopper, one of the few beings capable of using both magic and technology, who has stumbled upon this strange and dangerous world.
In The Merge, you will encounter a variety of creatures, both friendly and hostile, as you explore the vast landscape. Remember, trust is a fragile thing in The Merge, and not everyone can be trusted. You must be careful to choose your allies wisely and be prepared for any eventuality.
We hope you enjoy your time in The Merge and make the most of your unique abilities as a dimension hopper. The fate of the dimension is in your hands. Good luck!
OOC Hello and welcome to our brand new private modded Minecraft server!
I am excited to have you join us as we embark on this journey together. This server has been created specifically for our group of friends to play on, and we hope you have a great time.
On this server, we have a variety of mods installed to enhance gameplay and add new features to the game. Be sure to check out the list of mods on the server page to get an idea of what we have available. The server is on the newest version of Minecraft (1.19), and has a bunch of features that I have yet to play with. I am excited to build something interesting with you!
description:
Welcome to The Merge, a dimension where magic and technology coexist in a fragile balance. You are a dimension hopper, one of the few beings capable of using both magic and technology, who has stumbled upon this strange and dangerous world.
In The Merge, you will encounter a variety of creatures, both friendly and hostile, as you explore the vast landscape. Remember, trust is a fragile thing in The Merge, and not everyone can be trusted.

title: Mod List
content: [Forge] Snad Sand makes sugarcane grow faster!! Accelerated Decay Speeds up the leaf decaying process Ad Astra! “Live long and prosper, Ad Astra!” Advanced Peripherals “A Peripheral addon mod for Computercraft 1.16. You can communicate with Refined Storage, Applied Energistics2 or with the whole Minecraft world. Adds things like the Me Bridge, Rs Bridge, the Chat Box and more.” AE Additions - ExtraCells2 Fork “An Updated Extra Cells 2. Super Storage Cell, Wireless Transceiver, bigger cells(including for ae2 things), bigger cpus and more to come! Forge + Fabric” AE2 Things [Forge] “Introduces a new Cell type, advanced inscriber and crystal growth chamber” AEInfinityBooster Added Infinity Range Card and Dimension Card to AE2 Akashic Tome The Book of Books. Store every documentation book in one. Amplified Nether “256-tall nether with 3D biomes, mountains and more!” Angel Block Renewed A block you can place midair to help build skybases etc Angel Ring “This mod adds an angel ring, which allows you to fly like in creative mode for 1.14+. Inspired by Extra Utilities.” Apotheosis All things that should have been. AppleSkin Adds some useful information about food/hunger to the HUD Applied Cooking A mod that allows Applied Energistics 2 and Cooking for Blockheads to work together! Applied Energistics 2 “A Mod about Matter, Energy and using them to conquer the world..” Applied Energistics 2 Wireless Terminals An addon for Applied Energistics 2 that adds wireless versions of several Terminals Applied Mekanistics The official Mekanism support addon for AE2 Architectury API (Fabric/Forge) An intermediary api aimed to ease developing multiplatform mods. Ars Creo An addon for Ars Nouveau and Create Ars Nouveau “Craft custom spells, summon magical servants, and make powerful wearables and tools!” Artifacts Adds various treasure items that can be found through exploration AttributeFix Removes arbitrary limits on Minecraft’s attribute system. Fixes MANY mods! Auto Smithing Table Adds the capability the auto-craft Smithing Table recipes with the use of Forge Energy (FE) AutoRegLib A library to ease menial tasks in mod development. Balm (Forge Edition) Abstraction Layer (but not really)â„¢ for Blay’s multiplatform mods Bamboo Everything (Forge/Fabric) Adds extra blocks/items made with bamboo + a raft Forge and Fabric compatible Basic Nether Ores [Forge/Fabric] Spawns Vanilla and Modded Ores in the Nether BdLib A library of generic code for my other mods Better Advancements Successor to BetterAchievements for the new advancements system in minecraft 1.12+ Better Compatibility Checker Changes the default server compatability check to compare modpack versions Better Than Bunnies What could be better except some real fancy dapper bunnies? Better Than Llamas What could be better except some real fancy dapper llamas? Better Tridents You didnâ€™t know your trident could do that! BlockShot Easily share gameplay screenshots and short recordings safely BlockUI Easy to Use UI library for Forge mods Bookshelf An open source library for other mods! Botarium “A crossplatform API for devs that makes transfer and storage of items, fluids and energy easier, as well as some other helpful things” Build Guide (Forge+Fabric) “A client-side only mod to project shapes like circles and spheres into the world. It works both in singleplayer and multiplayer, even if the server doesn’t have the mod installed.” Building Gadgets A collection of Gadgets to make building large structures a little bit easier! Bygone Nether Adds new biome-specific structures and mobs to the nether dimension Caelus API (Forge) A coremod and API to provide developers access to elytra flight mechanics through an entity attribute. CC: Tweaked “CC: Tweaked is a fork of ComputerCraft, adding programmable computers, turtles and more to Minecraft.” Charging Gadgets A simple mod for charging with ForgeEnergy Charm of Undying (Forge) Adds curio support for the Totem of Undying so you can place it in a slot and don’t have to be holding it. Formerly known as Curio of Undying. Cloth Config API (Fabric/Forge) Config Screen API for Minecraft Clumps Clumps XP orbs together to reduce lag CobbleForDays Simple cobblestone generators CodeChicken Lib 1.8.+ Contains various tools to make modding easier. CoFH Core Contains Core Functionality for all Team CoFH mods. Also does some really cool stuff on its own! Colytra (Forge) Allows attachment of elytras to chestplates. Comforts (Forge) “Adds sleeping bags and hammocks for, respectively, portability and turning day to night, without setting new spawns. Comes in 16 different colors!” Common Capabilities Forge Capabilities that can be shared by multiple mods Compact Machines Adds one simple game mechanic: Small rooms inside of blocks. It basically gives you the ability to build your contraptions inside of a single block. Configured Automatic in-game configuration menus for every mod! Connected Glass Connected Glass adds new types of glass with connecting textures! Connectivity[Forge/Fabric] “Fix Login timeouts, Packet sizes errors, Payloads errors, ghostblocks and more.” Construction Wand Construction Wands make building easier! (A new take on the Builder’s Wand) Controlling Adds a search bar to the Key-Bindings menu Cooking for Blockheads Adds a cooking book and multiblock kitchens that only shows recipes you can make with what you currently have in your inventory. Crash Utilities Utilities for Server Admins Create Aesthetic Technology that empowers the Player Create Crafts & Additions Electrifying the Create mod! Create Plus Adds Goggle Helmets for Create Mod Creative Disk Adds a creative disk Refined Storage disk which contains all the items in game Curios API (Forge) A flexible and expandable accessory/equipment API for users and developers. Cyclic “Tools, Machines, Gear, potions, villagers, fully configurable” Cyclops Core “Library mod for EvilCraft, Integrated Dynamics and others.” Dark Utilities Expansive content mod which adds a little bit of everything. Deep Resonance Deep Resonance is a power generation mod for Minecraft Default Options A way for modpacks to ship a default (key) configuration without having to include an options.txt file. Also allows local options from any mod .cfg file. Delightful Configurable Farmer’s Delight addon with compat features and immersive new foods. DeLogger Stops Logging Spam Domum Ornamentum Millions of unique block variants and all stairs/slabs/walls/fence and more vanilla Minecraft forgot EdivadLib Just a common library for all my mods Enchant With Mob This mod adds the enchanter mob from Minecraft Dungeons Enchantment Descriptions Provides a way to get enchantment descriptions from enchanted books. Enchantment Requirements Adds tooltips for enchantment requirements. Ender Storage 1.8.+ linked color coded ender chests Engineer’s Decor “Adds cosmetic blocks for the engineer’s factory, workshop, and home.” Entangled Entangled allows you to ’entangle’ two blocks together! Entangled Fix Fixes an issue with the Entangled mod that causes servers to hang Experience Obelisk Standalone experience obelisk for easy XP storage and collection ExtraStorage “Add new blocks to Refined Storage, like more advanced crafters” Extreme Reactors This is a port of the Big Reactors mod by Erogenous Beef to the current Minecraft versions Extreme sound muffler (Forge) Forget about those nasty sounds! - Clientside sound muffler. FancyMenu [Forge] “Minecraft menus, but much more fancy! Customize menu screens with animations & more!” Farmer’s Delight A lightweight expansion to farming and cooking! Farsight [Forge] “See far chunks on clientside, even if the server has low view distance” FastSuite A performance upgrade for the JSON recipe system. FastWorkbench A performance upgrade for the crafting table. FerriteCore (Forge) Memory usage optimizations FindMe Search for an item in nearby inventories Flat Bedrock (Forge / Fabric) Make the world have flat bedrock Flower Patch Allows you to bunch together flowers into a single blockspace similar to pickles Flux Networks “Wireless Energy Networks, compatible with FE/EU/RF/TESLA/AE” ForceCraft “A semi-magical mod focused around power, called Force” FramedBlocks Fancy building blocks Friendly Fire Modifies combat to prevent friendly fire to pets and other mobs. FTB Backups 2 Updated verson of FTB Backups. FTB Chunks (Forge) A mod that allows you to claim chunks to protect your blocks and view minimap / large map FTB Essentials (Forge) Adds many essential utility commands for servers FTB Library (Forge) Common code for all GUI stuff in FTB Mods FTB Ranks (Forge) “Adds ranking system that lets you give certain players permissions, username formatting, etc.” FTB Teams (Forge) Library for mods that can utilize team progression Functional Storage Your classic storage drawers but with more upgrades! GeckoLib “A 3D animation library for entities, blocks, items, armor, and more!” Gobber [FORGE] New ores for making high-end gear and powerful items Gobber Delight (A Farmer’s Delight Add-on) Adds Gobber and Farmer’s Delight compatability. Vanilla style. Health Overlay (Forge) Display hearts in different colors Hex Casting Cast powerful Hexes on the fly by drawing patterns with a staff. Hexerei A Witchery and Magic mod Immersive Engineering A retro-futuristic tech mod! In Control! Be In Control of mob spawns Industrial Foregoing A collection of machines to make your minecraft builds easier to automate Integrated Crafting Craft stuff in Integrated Dynamics networks Integrated Dynamics A mod to take full and automated control of your appliances. Integrated Terminals Terminals for managing and overviewing Integrated Dynamics networks Integrated Tunnels Transfer other stuff over Integrated Dynamics networks Inventory Essentials Basic inventory tweaks. Lightweight and compatible. Inventory Sorter Simple inventory sorting tweaks Iron Bows (FORGE) “Iron, Golden, Diamond, Emerald and Netherite Bows.” Iron Chests Iron Chest mod It Shall Not Tick (ISNT) A performance mod focused on reducing the performance impact of ticking entities Item Collectors Item Collectors adds Collectors which collect items in a specified range! JAMD Just Another Mining Dimension JAOPCA Just A Ore Processing Compatibility Attempt Jump Over Fences Don’t let walls and fences stop you! Jump over them! Jumpy Boats Make your boat travels easier by making small jumps while in the boat Just Another Void Dimension Adds Just Another Void Dimension Just Enough Immersive Multiblocks Immersive Engineering addon that adds JEI support for multiblocks. Just Enough Items (JEI) View Items and Recipes Just Enough Professions (JEP) A JEI addon that adds profession workstations Konkrete [Forge] Just another boring library mod. KubeJS “Edit recipes, add new custom items, script world events, all in JavaScript!” LaserIO “Route Items, Fluids, and Energy around your world - with Lasers!” Lazy DataFixerUpper(LazyDFU) [FORGE] “Makes the initialization of DataFixerUpper ““lazy””” LibX LibX is a library mod with a lot of code that is shared between mods. Light Overlay (Rift/Forge/Fabric) A simple mod to provide users with NEI-like light level overlay. Little Contraptions Little add on mod that lets you put a Create mod contraption on a Little Logistics Barge! Little Logistics “Water and rail transport mod, automated boats & trains!” Lootr (Forge) A mod that makes it so nobody misses out on Loot! All loot chests are instanced per player and visually unique. Mahou Tsukai A magic mod focused on special effects and spell uniqueness McJtyLib “Companion mod for all mods by McJty (RFTools, XNet, Deep Resonance, Not Enough Wands, SignTastic, …))” ME Requester Keep items and fluids in your Applied Energistics 2 ME-System in stock. Measurements Allows measuring distance using a tape measure. MEGA Cells ME Greater Accumulation Cells - For when kilobytes just won’t do. Mekanism “High-tech machinery, powerful energy generation, fancy gadgets and more. Now on Curse!” Mekanism Additions “Additions module for Mekanism, contains things that don’t quite fit in the other modules.” Mekanism Generators Advanced energy generation for Mekanism. Mekanism Tools Powerful tools and armor for Mekanism. MineColonies “Grow your Own Massive Colony with Automation, Defense Structures, Raids and more” MineColonies for ComputerCraft Integration addon providing CC peripheral for MineColonies MineTogether “A Minecraft mod that enhances community and server features, such as global chat, chunk pre-generation, auto server join from protocol uri (via FTBApp), friends lists, private chats and many more features linked to the MineTogether platform.” Mining Gadgets Because mining with lasers is cool MmmMmmMmmMmm (Target Dummy) Target Dummy that show damage dealt and can be equipped with armor Mob Grinding Utils A Mod that adds fun ways to make mob farms Mod Name Tooltip Minecraft mod that shows an ItemStack’s mod name on its tooltip. Modonomicon Data-driven minecraft in-game documentation with progress visualization. Moonlight Lib “Custom Villagers AI and Map Markers, First and third person item animations, dynamic assets and registration & more” More Dragon Eggs Every kill gives an Egg More Frogs - Fabric/Quilt/Forge Adds more frog variants to minecraft. Mouse Tweaks Enhances inventory management by adding various functions to the mouse buttons. Moyai Adds naturally spawning Moyai to your game ðŸ—¿ Multi-Piston Multi-directional Piston Block Naturalist Adds new immersive wildlife with realistic behavior! Nature’s Aura “Collecting, using and replenishing the Aura naturally present in the world to create useful devices and unique mechanics” Nature’s Compass Nature’s Compass is an item that allows you to locate biomes anywhere in the world. Neat Minimalistic Functional Unit Frames for the modern Minecrafter NetherPortalFix Ensures correct destinations when travelling back and forth through Nether Portals in Multiplayer. Nyf’s Spiders Modifes spiders to be more realistic. Occultism “A magic mod inspired by the world of Jonathan Stroud’s Bartimaeus. With the help of occult rituals players can summon entities from the ““Other Side”” to perform magic.” Occultism KubeJS KubeJS plugin for Occultism. Oh The Biomes You’ll Go “An Adventure & Exploration mod like no other with unique, magical, realistic, and detailed biomes!” OpenBlocks Elevator Port of OpenBlocks Elevator. Packing Tape A small mod that lets you move things around. Patchouli “Accessible, Data-Driven, Dependency-Free Documentation for Minecraft Modders and Pack Makers” PAUCAL “Petrak@’s Assorted, Useful Collection of Assistance Library.” Pet Slow Mini Slow Pig Pen Cipher Adds the pigpen cipher to Minecraft Pipez Simple and efficient pipes Placebo A library mod Player Plates (Obsidian Plates) [Forge] Adds Extra Pressure plates Plonk Place items down in the world PneumaticCraft: Repressurized Doing cool stuff with pressurized air Pocket Storage Simple tiered mass item storage. PolyLib A Minecraft lib used for all of CreeperHosts mods Ponder for KubeJS Create custom Ponder scenes through KubeJS Powah! (Rearchitected) “A tech mod that adds various ways to generate, store and transmit Energy.” Puzzles Lib Why’s it called Puzzles you ask? That’s the puzzle! Quark A Quark is a very small thing. This mod is a collection of small things that improve the vanilla minecraft experience. Ranged Pumps Ranged Pumps is a simple mod that adds a pump that pumps liquids in a range Rapid Leaf Decay Makes leaf decay rapidly. Reborn Storage Refined Storage add-on adding multi-block crafters and larger disks Redstone Pen Pen to draw elaborated Redstone Tracks in all directions. Refined Cooking A mod that allows Refined Storage and Cooking for Blockheads to work together! Refined Storage An elegant solution to your hoarding problem. Refined Storage Addons An addon mod for Refined Storage. Refined Storage: Requestify Keep you refined storage stocked with crafteable items Resourceful Config Resourceful Config is a mod that allows for developers to make crossplatform configs Resourceful Lib Lib for Team Resourceful and more RFTools Base RFTools Base: base mod for all McJty tech mods RFTools Builder “RFTools addon mod adding the builder, shield system and much more” RFTools Power RFTools addon for all power generator/storage RFTools Storage RFTools Storage addon RFTools Utility General RFTools blocks that don’t fit in a more specific category Rhino “A fork of Mozilla’s Rhino library, modified for use in mods” RSInfinityBooster Added Infinity Range Card Runelic A runic font for Minecraft. Scannable “One scanner to find them, and with eye candy bind them.” SebastrnLib A common mod project for all Sebastrn’s mods Server Performance - Smooth Chunk Save[Forge/Fabric] “Enables lag-free continuous chunk saving, increasing server TPS” ServerConfig Updater Allows Packdevs to update ServerConfigs Shrink. Shrink is a small mod for Minecraft that allows players to change their player’s size. Shutup Experimental Settings! Removes the Experimental Settings prompt before world creation. Silent Gear “Upgradeable tools, weapons, and armor. Custom materials system!” Simple Discord Rich Presence (Forge / Fabric) Simple Discord Rich Presence Simple Tomb Simple Tombstone is a grave to store your items when you die Simply Light Simple light for a complicated world. Sky Villages [Forge] “Yes, that’s right! Villages in the land of clouds! Explore massive and beautiful villages in the sky!” Sneak Through Berries Lets you sneak through Sweet Berry Bushes without taking damage Sophisticated Backpacks “Yet another backpack mod this time with backpack you can place in world, color in different color combinations, upgrade with more inventory and enhance with many functional upgrades” Sophisticated Core Library mod for Sophisticated mods Sophisticated Storage Storage mod with multiple tiers and functional upgrades spark “spark is a performance profiler for Minecraft clients, servers and proxies.” Spirit Spirit - a Soul Shards inspired mod - Spawn your own mobs with an enhanced mob spawner Statues A little decorative and functional mod Structurize “Copy structures, paste structures, manipulate structures (100% GUI)” Super Factory Manager ( SFM ) “A 1.12.2 port for Vswe’s modjam mod, Steve’s Factory Manager” SuperMartijn642’s Config Lib Config Lib makes dealing with config files just a bit easier. SuperMartijn642’s Core Lib SuperMartijn642’s Core Lib adds lots of basic implementations that allow for similar code between different Minecraft versions! Supplementaries “Vanilla+ additions: Jars, signposts, faucets, weather vanes spring launchers, sconces, planters, lights, decoration and automation” SwingThroughGrass Kill mobs and players through grass Technobauble A mod that adds various baubles/curios Tempad Create a portal to any location from any location! TerraBlender (Forge) A library mod for adding biomes in a simple and compatible manner! The One Probe More immersive alternative for WAILA The Twilight Forest “A realm basked in mystery and eerie twilight, you will overpower terrifying creatures and secure the adventure of a lifetime; in the Twilight Forest.” Thermal Expansion Expanding Minecraft Thermally! A server-friendly and content-rich blend of magic and technology! Thermal Foundation The Foundation of a Thermally Expanding World! Thermal Innovation Thermal Technology marches on. Adds Thermal-style tools and equipment! Thermal Integration Thermal integrates with others! Time in a bottle standalone “Time in a bottle (Random things) - Standalone, ported to 1.16 - 1.18” Titanium Library for Horizon Studio Toast Control “Control toasts, those popups in the corner!” Tool Kit Adds useful commands and improves the vanilla structure blocks - ToolKit Torchmaster Adds a special torch which prevents mob spawning in a configurable radius Trample Stopper Stop Farmland form getting trampled Trash Cans “Trash Cans adds trash cans which can be used to void items, liquids, and energy!” Travel Anchors Adds Travel Anchors from EnderIO Traveler’s Titles (Forge) “Epic, RPG-like titles when entering biomes & dimensions!” Unusual End ï¿½ï¿½ An Improved Vanilla+ End ! ViesCraft Machines Airships through the eyes of Vies! Visual Workbench Items stay inside of crafting tables and are also rendered on top. It’s really fancy! Vitalize An addon for Spirit that simulates the killing of mobs and their drops Void Totem (Forge) A mod that adds a totem that prevents you from dying in the void. Waystones “Teleport back to activated waystones. For Survival, Adventure or Servers.” When Dungeons Arise - Forge! Adds various elegant -and likely hostile- roguelike dungeons and structures that generate on your worlds! Whisperwoods “Adds spooky forest creatures like wisps, moths, the Zotzpyre, the Hidebehind, and the Hirschgeist; with items like ghost lights and the Hand of Fate” Wireless Chargers Wireless Chargers adds chargers which can charge nearby blocks and players! Wither Skeleton Tweaks General improvements to wither skeletons XNet “XNet is a highly optimized networking cable system for items, energy, fluids, information, …” XNet Gases Move Mekanism chemicals around with the power of XNet XyCraft Sci-fi Aesthetics and Technology XyCraft: World World Generation for XyCraft YUNG’s API (Forge) A library mod for some of YUNG’s Minecraft mods YUNG’s Better Desert Temples (Forge) A complete redesign of Minecraft’s desert temples! YUNG’s Better Dungeons (Forge) A complete redesign of Minecraft’s dungeons! YUNG’s Better Strongholds (Forge) A complete redesign of Minecraft’s strongholds YUNG’s Better Witch Huts (Forge) Adds overhauled witch huts to swamps! YUNG’s Bridges (Forge) Adds beautiful naturally generated bridges throughout the world YUNG’s Extras (Forge) “Extra structures, features, and vanilla+ content suitable for any modpack”
description: [Forge] Snad Sand makes sugarcane grow faster!! Accelerated Decay Speeds up the leaf decaying process Ad Astra! “Live long and prosper, Ad Astra!” Advanced Peripherals “A Peripheral addon mod for Computercraft 1.16. You can communicate with Refined Storage, Applied Energistics2 or with the whole Minecraft world. Adds things like the Me Bridge, Rs Bridge, the Chat Box and more.” AE Additions - ExtraCells2 Fork “An Updated Extra Cells 2. Super Storage Cell, Wireless Transceiver, bigger cells(including for ae2 things), bigger cpus and more to come!

title: Definitions
content: The Merge The name of the dimension where the worlds of magic and technology have collided. The merge is home to a variety of creatures and is a haven for adventurers and outcasts from across the multiverse Dimension Hopper A being capable of traversing dimensions and crossing into different worlds. Dimension hoppers are rare and posses unique abilities that allow them to use both magic and technology Great Collision A catastrophic event that occurred in The Merge, causing the worlds of magic and technology to collide and unleashing a wave of chaos and destruction.
description: The Merge The name of the dimension where the worlds of magic and technology have collided. The merge is home to a variety of creatures and is a haven for adventurers and outcasts from across the multiverse Dimension Hopper A being capable of traversing dimensions and crossing into different worlds. Dimension hoppers are rare and posses unique abilities that allow them to use both magic and technology Great Collision A catastrophic event that occurred in The Merge, causing the worlds of magic and technology to collide and unleashing a wave of chaos and destruction.

title: Connect to the Server
content:
The server connection information should be preloaded in the client, but in the event that it is not this page is provided. If your username is not on the whitelist, please let Nathan know so that you can be added!
Primary Endpoint: nate601.me
Secondary Endpoint: mc.nate601.me
Tertiary Endpoint: 192.161.174.159:25565
The server has a DynMap instance available as well!
Connection information will be provided soon once chunk pre-generation has begun!
